Magic
Spell Slots: D1: 5; D2: 4; D3: 3; D4: 1
Spells:
Barkskin (D2 Alte): Touched gains +1 AC and non-spell saves for 14 rd
Cure Disease (D3 Necr): Touched recovers from disease (Reverse infects; Save neg)
Detect Snares & Pits (D1 Divi): Self discerns outdoor traps or indoor pits in a 10'x40' path for 40 rd
Feign Death (D2 Necr): R10' Willing target appears dead, takes half damage, and gains immunity to draining for 24 rd
Fire Trap (D2 Evoc): Opening touched object inflicts 1d4+10 HP in a 5' radius (Save half)
Hold Animal (D3 Ench): R80' Immobilizes 4 animals for 20 rd (Save neg)
Invisibility To Animals (D1 Alte): Touched becomes invisible to animals for 20 rd
Obscurement (D2 Alte): Creates a mist that limits vision in a 100' cu for 40 rd
Pass Without Trace (D1 Ench): Touched leaves no tracks or scent for 10 tn
Predict Weather (D1 Divi): Forecasts weather in a 9 sq mile area for the next 20 hr
Protection From Fire (D3 Abju): Touched gains immunity to normal fire and +4 saves and half damage from magical fire (immunity to magical fire if cast on self) for 120 HP
Repel Insects (D4 Abju): 10' radius expels normal insects and wards against giant ones (Save inflicts 1d6 HP) for 10 tn
Speak With Animals (D1 Alte): R40' Self may converse w/chosen type of animal for 20 rd
Magic Notes:
Bonus Spells: Spell level D1x2, D2
Charming Music: R40' 44% charm creatures while playing (Save 1 rd), make suggestion to charmed (Save -2 neg)
Defensive Song: Counteract song attacks, soothe shriekers
Poetic Inspiration: Performance gives allies +1 attack and +10% morale for 1 tn after 2 rd
Shapeshift: May change into a natural animal, regaining 1d6x10% HP, 3/dy
